Name: Balance Patch
Minor_Changes: Poseidon went from 2700 points to 2800 points.
Hoplites had their armor save improved to 4+ from 5+ but lost the benefit of +2 to saves if the unit was 15 models or larger.
Notes: Greeks were proving too dependant on Poseidon, so his points were raised to make him less of an autopick. Hoplites are still bad tho lol.
